DOC.brief_summary: Coronary revascularization ( CR ) increase rapidly China varies significantly proportion ( PCI : CABG=15:1 ) . Few study assess appropriateness CR China . Recently , National Center Cardiovascular Disease organize expert release Chinese version appropriate use criterion ( C-AUC ) coronary revascularization RAND method aim regulate indication CR . The criterion consider contribute clinical practice , quality assessment health insurance policy , however , validation C-AUC unknown . Thus investigator study aim assess validation Chinese AUC multi-center prospective registry . The investigator recruit 4000 patient undergo elective coronary angiography positive outcome consecutively collect baseline information . Sequently , one-year follow do collect prognose , include death , rehospitalization , medicine , medical compliance life quality etc . One hand , investigator compare outcomes different therapy indication accord C-AUC evaluate validation C-AUC . On hand , investigator evaluate rationality CAD therapy Beijing C-AUC .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Chinese Version Appropriate Use Criteria Coronary Revascularization
